snippet.title: Johnny Depp Thanks Wife Amber Heard For Putting Up With Him | Palm Springs Film Festival 2016
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp admitted that he was just going to "wing it" when he took the stage at the Palm Springs International Film Festival's gala ceremony on Saturday night. The superstar snagged the Desert Palm Achievement Award for Actor for his portrayal of gangster Whitey Bulger in Black Mass, and though he said he's "not good" at giving speeches, he had some heartfelt words for the movie's director — and his wife, Amber Heard.
